alert.note: Alert for Central Cook; Lake; Northern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 9:31AM CST until January 13 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow, hazardous travel conditions, and strong northwesterly wind gusts expected. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches are expected away from Lake Michigan. Northwesterly wind gusts of 45 mph are expected after midnight tonight. * WHERE...Lake IL, Northern Cook and Central Cook Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain may mix with snow this afternoon before changing back to snow this evening. The strongest northwesterly winds are expected after midnight tonight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
